A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

In the heart of the Empire, the blighted earth is drenched with Oeridian blood, fueling the inferno of revolt. A woman seeks heroes to help her find out why, before it can bring ruin across the Sheldomar.

A Keoland regional adventure for PCs of APLs 6-12 and Part Three of the Tales of Linth series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215168.name: Burning Brightly
215168.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

“The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.”

Dorglast has always been a bastion of strength for the Darkwatch. Now, dread stories filter out of those dark hallways about a strange burning man that hunts the Knights of the Malagari. Amidst this confusion, a fallen man seeks to save the Knighthood, his Kingdom, and his soul. One burns within, one without, but only one will burn through the night.

A Keoland regional adventure for PCs of APLs 6-12 and the conclusion to the Crowning Glory series.

User summary:

A one-page PDF "Notes and Errata" was issued for this adventure.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215169.name: The Madness of King Jorgos
215169.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

By all accounts, Viscount Richart Jorgos has gone mad! Are the machinations of the Lizard King behind his decline? Or is a more sinister plot afoot?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 8-16 and Conclusion of the Sakatha Returns series.

215170.name: A Tale of Two Lions
rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215170.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Upon her divine loom, Istus weaves the threads of fate into tapestries of destiny. Within the oldest kingdom on Oerth, a sinister cabal’s plans for domination stand on the edge of fruition. Can those threads be undone to make right what was rendered so terribly wrong?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 6-12, and the Conclusion of the All Good Things series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215171.name: The Thin Edge of the Wedge
215171.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Danger lurks in Gand, and the clerics of the Laughing Rogue are on the case – or are they the ones responsible?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-8.

User summary:

A one-page PDF "Notes and Errata" was issued for this adventure.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215172.name: Like a Leech
215172.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Hold on as if you belong.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-8.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215173.name: Forest of Ribbons
215173.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

For many years the Dreadwood has housed secrets beyond compare, secrets kept by a small cabal of militants called the Dreadwalkers. Secrets that would be deadly should they ever stir to life and erupt from the care of their warders. The forces of unrest are legion and the Dreadwalkers dwindle season by season. Pushed to the breaking point, a desperate gamble is taken to develop a new weapon against Keoland’s biggest secret... and Keoland’s most vicious enemy.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215174.name: Baby's Breath
215174.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The past three years in the County of Linth have seen tremendous upheaval - civil war, and the collapse of the ancient house which ruled those lands. The fate of the kingdom has at times revolved around the Countess Hannah Linth, the only known survivor of her depraved and wicked royal family. But now, as the eldritch blight of the County takes a dramatic turn, the kingdom may find this child to be its only hope.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 12-16, and the conclusion to the Tales of Linth series.

This adventure includes an optional encounter at increased TU cost; if played, this event should be scheduled as a two-round adventure.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215175.name: Old Sins Cast Long Shadows
215175.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A mysterious summons calls to you and your companions. Every ninety-nine years members of a secret order gather their members to save Keoland from a town long forgotten. Once again Ninety-nine years have passed and now the order finds itself too weak to contain this threat any longer. Desperate times and desperate measures, so the bards say. Prepare to visit a town a town that never was, to confront an evil that may never leave.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 8-12, and part one of the To The Last Man Standing series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215176.name: Pemlo's Legacy
215176.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

To hear him tell it, Pemlo Penchant has been a hero, a confidant to the king and a true master of his craft. Others call him a brawler, a braggart and a drunk. Whatever the truth, a life lived like Pemlo’s leaves wreckage in its wake. Now, old scores are being settled. Will you stand with the brewmaster of Crookhollow or against him?

A roleplaying intensive Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215177.name: The Price of Hospitality
215177.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As political tensions run high in Keoland, our mighty heroes escape to the backwater Barony of Mill Creek. Surely danger couldn’t follow them to this isolated area. Surely the scheming Keoish nobility would leave this boring farming community alone. Surely you must be joking.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-8.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215178.name: Forest of Scales
215178.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Dotting the southwest border of Nume Eor, a series of recently-built towers stand watch against the dangers of both the Hool Marsh and the Dreadwood. Reports have flowed into Jaedrae on a regular basis – until now. Two of the nearby towers have not reported in, and Richart Jorgos has ordered an investigation. Messengers must be sent to all outposts to determine their status, and the Viscount once again calls upon adventurers to supplement his resources.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-10, and Part 3 of the Forests series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215179.name: By Virtue or Venture
215179.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A celebration in the port city, a chance meeting and the concerns of a gem merchant in the city can all lead up to one thing. You are once again in Gradsul, and some questions shouldn’t be asked and some people shouldn’t be met.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 4-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215180.name: The Herald of Woe
215180.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Westkeep is in need of supplies, yet three caravans of armor, gear, and weapons have disappeared in what should have been a short trip off the Javan and through a mere sliver of the Hool. Once ambivalent relations with the Lizardfolk have grown tense as overzealous guards blame the tribes and skirmishes flare. Can you survive long enough to discover what is going on deep within the swamp?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 4-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215181.name: Mist Taken
215181.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The union of two dwarven clans is a momentous occasion, as rare as a precious diamond. This is made even more precious when the union can also serve to bring two countries together in time of need. So the wedding of a prominent clan of dwarves from the Principality of Ulek to the dwarves of Clan Stonecrow carries a special weight. However, there are those who want to see this wedding fail, and those who delight in simple slaughter. The real trick is determining who is who.

A terror of the night once thought defeated rises again to threaten the community of Curget in the Good Hills of Keoland.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215182.name: To Catch a Thief
215182.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Knowledge is power ... and in Keoland, it can also be deadly. Is a commission to recover a stolen book and catch a thief as simple as it seems?

A Keoland Regional adventure for APLs 2-10, and Part 1 of the Philosopher’s Stone series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215183.name: Castlefall
215183.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Godakin Keep was once the spearhead of Keoland’s imperial ambitions. From its courtyard countless soldiers have marched, bringing the illumination of the Lion Throne throughout the Sheldomar Valley. Now in times of peace it serves as a nearly forgotten outpost, an old warhorse put to pasture, a punishment for those sent to serve there. A month after a request for additional soldiers was denied, all communication from the Keep has ceased. Finally, a tensquad of Royal Standards sent to investigate returns a message. “Godakin is liberated, next the liberation of the oppressed begins. Woe to those who oppose.”

A spear, resharpened, now points inward.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 6-12, and Part Two of the To the Last Man Standing.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215184.name: Face of the Scourge
215184.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Cryllor has seen many changes, and in those changes a dangerous Count has returned to power, forcing his benevolent daughter into seclusion. People starve in the streets, while a twisted justice is enforced in the county. Can a single voice calling for help start a change that the county needs?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215185.name: Bright Scaled Horror
215185.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A delicate balance within Keoland has been destroyed, and an ancient enemy of the Empire has chosen this time to strike. Godakin Keep on the western border of the Empire has fallen to treachery and now flies a foreign banner. However, all is not darkness, as a powerful relic has been snatched from the grasping claws of the enemy and travels to the hands of the King. As a black tide surges eastward on the heels of the relic, a strange messenger arrives in the town of Black Top with a message of hope. Will a hastily convened council of heroes be able to take advantage of the message, or will it be drowned by the black tide of war?

A roleplaying intensive Keoland regional adventure for APLs 6-12, and Part Three of the To the Last Man Standing series.

215186.name: Santa's Renegades 2016
boardgamecompilation: Apotheca: Tima the Red Promo Card
215186.description:
Unwrap special powers this holiday season! Each gift box is a special gift created for Renegade Fans.

Contents:
7 card pack for Lotus
1 promo tile for Lanterns: The Harvest Festival
1 character card for Covert
1 apothecary for Apotheca: The Secret Potion Society
1 board tile for Snow Tails
1 card for World’s Fair 1893
1 choice token for Dicey Goblins
1 card for Clank!
1 Wild Die for FUSE


Lotus: 7 Frosted Lotus Petals - Replace the 7 lotus cards from the wildflower deck with these seven frosted lotus petals. Play as normal!

Lanterns - Snowflake Tile - Remove one other random tile and replace it with this tile. Follow other regular setup rules.

Covert - Kane Character Card - Add to the available character cards. This power can only be used when drawing mission or agency cards from the regular face up options, not when taking cards from the discard.

Apotheca - Tima Apothecary Card - Use the power from the red Apothecary as if it were your own.

Snow Tails - Polar Plunge Track. 2 Sided Track Board - Dangerous Pit: Pick up your speed before the chasm! If you are going less than speed 5 when you cross the line, you will take damage! If you are going to slow, take dent cards equal to 5 minus your speed. If you end your movement in the abyss,, take any necessary dents and then don't refill your hand.
The Narrows: Follow normal rules, but be careful! This side will require some careful maneuvering!

World's Fair 1893: J. Alex Kevern Promo Card - When setting up, replace one copy of George Davis with this card and follow the rules for George Davis.

Dicey Goblins - Naughty Goblin Token - When setting up, replace one of the regular goblin choice tokens with this token.

Clank - Dire Wolf Promo Card - Add this card to the Dungeon Deck when beginning the game. When it is played, count to total number of monsters that are available to fight. Add this number of Clank! and Swords to your pool for this turn.

FUSE Wild Die - Setup: Add the Wild Die to the bag with the other dice. Gameplay: If the Wild Die is rolled, it is chosen by a player just like any other die. If the # symbol is showing, the die can be placed on any space showing a number. If the color symbol is showing, the die can be placed on any space showing a color. If a space needs both a specific number AND color, the Wild Die cannot be placed there.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215187.name: The Stalkyard
215187.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As an unusually hot Keoish summer fades into autumn, events on the western border of the Empire continue to smolder. The truth is now filtering to the ears of Keoish citizens: war has come to the western marches and with every passing day marches eastward to Niole Dra. As the Keoish Empire reels from this sudden onslaught, a bold counterattack is planned on the heart of the assaulting forces: Godakin Keep. But is the assault a diversion, a suicide mission, or a stroke of genius? Only time will tell, because only the survivors author the histories.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 8-12, and Part Four of the To the Last Man Standing series.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215188.name: Forest of Caverns
215188.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Green Man of Geoff has returned. The Necromancer has been defeated. The Nethernight has been destroyed, allowing the Linth lands their slow process of recovery. External threats nullified, the Archdruidess of the Sheldomar Valley, Reynard Yargrove turns her full attention to finding a way to close the portals in the Dreadwood. Four keys. Four tribes. Four seasons. Four turns. Soon, the planar rifts will become permanent, forever turning the primordial forest into a pseudonatural planescape. Time is running out. An ancient enemy gathers its army in anticipation. Will you do your part to stop them?

A Keoland Regional investigative Dreadwood adventure for APLS 4-10 in the Forests series. Heroes are encouraged; mercenaries stay home. Large creatures may experience difficulty in this module.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215189.name: Thick as Thieves
215189.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As the Empire of Keoland rages with war, King Kimbertos plans an unusual ceremony to bolster his peoples’ resolve. The mastermind behind the invasion desires to see the ceremony interrupted in order to rob hope from a kingdom at war. What will ensue is a maze of manipulation and deceit, which can only mean that the most dangerous weapon here is not made of steel but rather of influence. Welcome to the recoronation of King Kimbertos Skotti the First.

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 6-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215190.name: Forest of the Outlands
215190.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Four Keys. Four Tribes. Four Seasons. Four Turns. Time has run out for Reynard Yargrove. Not even the wishes of an archmage are enough to remove the taint of the Far Realms from the archdruidess, and no creature outside of Nature can close the portals. A trip to Obad-Hai's realm might be just the remedy.

A Keoland Regional planar-hopping Dreadwood adventure for APLS 6-12 in the Forests series.

215191.name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 1: Ties That Bind Part One
videogameseries: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier
215191.description:
When family is all you have left…how far will you go to protect it? Four years after society was ripped apart by undead hands, pockets of civilization emerge from the chaos. But at what cost? Can the living be trusted on this new frontier?

Source: The Developer Website.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215192.name: The Daunting Spire
215192.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Baron Malweig of Dilwych requests your assistance, asking you to venture forth to an ancient dangerous site, breech its defenses, and find weapons for use in the coming battles.

A Keoland Regional adventure for APLs 4-12.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215193.name: The Secret
215193.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

It is Keoland's hour of need, and the Count Orloc has gone missing. A call has gone out to adventurers to find him, so he can help stand against the Army of The Returned. But will the Count's secret unite the kingdom... or divide it?

A Keoland regional adventure for APLs 2-12.

This adventure contains a challenging Optional Encounter.

215194.name: StarBlood Arena
215194.description:
User Summary

Starblood Arena drops you into the cockpit of your own mech in an intense, first-person action shooter.

215195.name: Nex Machina
215195.description:
User Summary

Taking hints from both Robotron and Smash TV, Nex Machina focuses on pure arcade action, voxel destruction, and competition.

215196.name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles
215196.description:
User Summary

The hero will help residents by contributing through talents like farming, crafting, cooking, fishing and brewing, which will help them build relationships and unlock rewards. There are also eight different environments to explore across Gemea, as the hero joins up with etheral Sprites, the only creatures who can dispel the encroaching darkness.

215197.name: Omen of Sorrow
215197.description:
User Summary

Omen of Sorrow is a horror fighting game, where 12 iconic characters engage, either locally or online, in a single deathmatch or through the unholy trial story mode to define who’ll cast its shadow over the hearts of men for the next century.

215198.name: Fallen Legion
215198.description:
Control four characters simultaneously and master devastating combo attacks in furious real-time battles.

Source: The Game Website.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215199.name: Forest of Two Kingdoms
215199.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A thousand years ago, fleeing the destruction of the Twin Cataclysms, twelve Suel tribes migrated east through what became known as Slerotin's Pass. Three remained in the Sheldomar Valley: the Rhola and their Lizhal allies, the Neheli and their Linth allies, the Lerara... and their Malhel masters. A thousand years in the Far Realms may have altered the physical form of the Malhel, but their motive remains the same; it's time to Rejoin the Empire.

The finale of the Forest series for [characters level] 8 - 16.

215200.name: Surgeon Simulator: Experience Reality
215200.description:
User Summary

Surgeon Simulator is bringing the ER to VR!

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215201.name: The Last Stand
215201.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

You have heard the rumors and seen the signs, the Army of the Returned moves closer to the capital of the kingdom. Heroes from around the land have been called upon to help with Niole Dra’s defense, and you are among them. But Lashton has other plans for you. Can you do his bidding and still stand with your king to defend the gem of the Sheldomar.

A Keoland Regional adventure for APLs 6-14.

215202.name: Dino Frontier
215202.description:
Dino Frontier lets you build and manage a frontier settlement in a world where the wild west and Jurassic collide. You assume the role of Big Mayor overlooking your settlement in tabletop scale VR. You must carefully balance resources while growing your town. Wild dinosaurs roam the land acting as both dangerous foe and tantalizing asset.

Source: The Game Website.

215203.name: Sundered
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Visual Art Honorable Mention
2017 PAX Curse Award Best Graphics of the Year Winner
2017 PAX Curse Award Editor’s Choice Winner
2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
215203.description:
Sundered is a horrifying fight for survival and sanity, a hand­-drawn epic from the ​creators of ​Jotun. Resist or embrace.

Source: The Game Website.

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
215204.name: Aftermath
215204.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

So this is what war is really like. Death... Violence... Carnage... No corner of Keoland is untouched. The powers that be ask for your aid in the aftermath. What becomes of Keoland, and its citizens?

The final Keoland regional adventure for APLs 4-14.

215205.name: Freak Out!
215205.description:
The Original Dope Smokers Game

A board game similar in play to Monopoly i.e. Move around the board, passing start, prison and opportunity cards (Freak Out/Contact).

There are 4 concentric circles on the board, Smokers/Dealers/Suppliers/Growers) the aim being to deal your way to the Growers Circle.

215207.name: Warfighter: WWII Expansion #3 – Germany!
215207.description:
Description from the publisher:

Warfighter WWII third expansion. New card deck with German units.

215209.name: A Very Merry Giftmas
215209.description:
Publisher's blurb:

It's that time of year, full of Christmas cheer, when Santa steals your toys.

Wait, what?

User summary:

For 1st - 2nd level characters.

215210.description:
The Saint Nicholas Scoring Board is a Scoring Board for Carcassonne II that was sold by cundco.de exclusively on Saint Nicholas Day. It was limited to a number of 150 items.

The game rules for the Saint Nicholas Scoring Board:

If your scoring meeple ends or crosses the number 6 as last player or the number 24 as first player (numbers are marked with a sticker), you will immediately get an additional turn.
This means, that after this scoring phase, you immediately draw another tile and take another turn. Once your action is finished it's the next players turn.
215210.name: Carcassonne: Nikolaus-Zählleiste

215211.name: Brain Game
215211.description:
From the box:

BRAIN GAME is an exciting memory game.

The cards show well-known landmarks - but each card only shows half the picture. The object of the game is to find the matching pairs.

To start, place all the cards face down on the table. Each player in turn turns 2 cards face up. If they make a pair (they are the two halves of the same picture) that player takes the two cards and scores one point. If they do not form a pair, the two cards are turned face down once again and the next player takes a turn.

The game continues until all the matching pairs are found and the player with the most pairs wins the game.

215212.description:
This map is an unofficial fan made expansion. Symbols & Graphics Copyright © 2004-2015 Days of Wonder, Inc. Produced with permission of Days of Wonder, for non-commercial use only.


This follows the principles of the basic Ticket to Ride game on a special board with special cards and rules. The object of the game is to gain the most points by travelling various routes and outwitting other players. You will need the train pieces and the train cards from either the US or Europe base games (or you can buy them from the Days of Wonder shop.

There is an extra set of Tourist cards for the cities, each with a value to be earned by visiting that city. These cards are dealt/picked up alongwith tickets in the same quantity and with the same 'keep/dispose' rules.

There are also spanners along some tracks which may help or hinder you. The board does not have any grey tracks or parallel tracks - but there are some options in the spanner pack.

The 9 bonuses give you extra points.

There are many new options in the rules: exchange all your cards at the start but keep all the new ones: discard 5 cards and pick up 5 new ones, as your turn: earn extra points: and many more. You can also call time when your wagon stock reaches 3, if you want, giving you the advantage of stopping other players completing tickets.
215212.name: Scandinavia (fan expansion to Ticket to Ride)

215213.description:
The throne to the Kingdom of Aurum lies unclaimed. Six great houses vie for control of the land in an ongoing dispute of title, territory, and birthright. Embroiled in conflict, the lords and ladies lock eyes on the crown as they fight to contend with a great plague that has now turned upon the people, ravaging the kingdom for which they war.

In Cutthroat Kingdoms, you take on the role of a leading lord or lady of one of the six eminent Houses in the Kingdom of Aurum — a grim fantasy world fraught with danger, intrigue, and plague. You must use your armies to claim territories, gather wealth, recruit hirelings, and hire mercenaries as you pursue your nefarious plots and jockey for power. Political intrigue and assassinations abound, and powerful strategic alliances are offset by bloody conflicts. Most importantly, will you strive for domination alone, or tie your fortunes to another house through a well-placed political marriage?

Cutthroat Kingdoms is a competitive game that features marriage-alliance team mechanisms in which strategic planning and decisive military moves can swing the course of the Kingdom. Changing territories and events make each game unique. Open negotiation, deal-making, and tabletalk are all encouraged — nay, necessary to win!
215213.name: Cutthroat Kingdoms

215215.name: Overgrowth of the Undying
215215.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Overgrowth hides humanity’s secrets in plain sight.

The wild spaces have grown to nearly swallow the area in bundles of vines, trees, and overgrown wastelands. Here, you will find massive beasts, new Dust-Bowl settlements, and pre-fall secrets that start to explain the fall of humanity and the birth of the Strains as we know them.

Welcome to the Overgrowth, we hope you don’t end up lost. This book contains information on the following:

Details on the Nuclear Family Faith

Strain details for Rovers, Natural Ones, and Remnants
Mechanics for massive creatures found in the Overgrowth
Details on Mutation and Evolution




Location Details for The Overgrowth Region and Surrounding Expanses including:

The Overgrowth, Westward Excess, Mountaina, I-Die-Low, Yellstone,Skatchen Land, The Tinderlands, Lorado, The Drylands, Deserter

215216.name: Bustling Marketplace
215216.description:
From publisher blurb:

Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your session to life? Well fear not! That’s where the 20 Things line comes in. Compiled from the free 20 Things posts available at Raging Swan’s website, this short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your adventure. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation. This instalment provides eight tables designed to help you to flesh out and bring to life a bustling marketplace.

20 Things #9: Bustling Marketplace comprises the following 20 Things articles, along with other supplementary material:

5 Different Places to Have a Market
10 Merchants with Personality
20 Deals Too Good To Be True
20 Interesting Stalls to Find in a Market
20 Rumours to Hear in a Bustling Marketplace
20 Things to See in a Bustling Marketplace
20 Types of Stall in a Bustling Marketplace

215217.name: Owlkeep Academy
215217.description:
From publisher blurb:

Owlkeep Academy is a story roleplaying game about the fallout of a magical war. Thirty years ago a civil war was fought inside the walls of Owlkeep Academy, a secret school for children with ‘the gift.’ The victors stumbled out of the war as masters of their craft, but also as victims of unspeakable horrors. Over the intervening years, those same veterans found they didn’t belong in the mundane world. They never ‘quite fit in.’ Today, they’ve returned to Owlkeep to rebuild the academy and mentor the newest students, bringing with them their mastery… and their baggage.

Each game in the Protocol series is zero-prep for 3 or more players.

The game length is exponentially long, so games with more players take more time to complete. The Protocol Series requires a deck of poker cards as well as tokens to track drama points.

215218.name: Holy Diver (Revised)
215218.description:
From publisher blurb:

Holy Diver is a story roleplaying game homage to Ronnie James Dio. With characters and events drawn directly from the lyrics of Ronnie James Dio songs (from Rainbow, Black Sabbath, and his self-titled work), the game is a strange trip through the golden lyrics of the metal god himself. Specifically, the game is about fantasy adventurers on a quest to the Silver Mountain, to see ‘the Witch’.

The adventurers may never, never come home.

Each game in the Protocol series is zero-prep for 3 or more players.
The game length is exponentially long, so games with more players take more time to complete. The Protocol Series requires a deck of poker cards as well as tokens to track drama points.

215219.name: Fate Core Stunts 3: Scientific Heroes
215219.description:
From publisher blurb:

Scientific Heroes need their science. You not only have a resource of pre-made scientific stunts but what every mad scientist needs: Minions.

215220.name: For Gold and Glory
215220.description:
From publisher blurb:

New Victims of the Demon Lord

For Gold and Glory examines dwarfs living in Rûl, revealing the secrets of their origins and how they fit into the tapestry of people who share these lands, providing those who want to play a dwarf character with the lore the need to flesh them out in detail. In addition, this supplement also offers character creation rules that, when used in place of those presented in the main rulebook, will help players develop a rich and interesting background to better ground their dwarf characters in the setting.

215221.name: Overlords Issue 3
215221.description:
From publisher blurb:

We've Gone Global!

The roster of the Overlords includes criminals from all over the world. Some are empowered with super
human abilities. Others are possessed of extraordinary skills. But whatever their specializations, these criminals use their talents to aid in the nefarious schemes of their allies within the organization.

Crusher (PL 10): A nigh-invulnerable NYC street thug.
Gorgon (PL 9): A Belgian petrifier made of living stone.
Hypershock (PL 8): An Australian in a stolen electrical suit.
Lasher (PL 8): A British dominatrix with electro-whips.
Nightfall (PL 8): A physicist with shadow powers, and a taste for vengeance.
Outback Jack (PL 8): A trick boomerang-wielding illegal game hunter.




Super Powered Legends. Because sometimes what you need is a character everyone will recognize, even if they’ve never met her before.

215222.name: Everyman Options: Unchained Fighters
215222.description:
From publisher blurb:

Just when you thought your fighter was unchained enough, Everyman Gaming LLC returns with a vengeance! (And a sequel!) Following on the footsteps of the instantly acclaimed Everyman Unchained: Fighters, Everyman Options: Unchained Fighters outfits your fighter with a slew of archetypes, feats, and alternate class options that will enable him to take on the world!

Everyman Options: Unchained Fighters includes:

A slew of archetypes taken from throughout the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game that have been specifically updated and redesigned to work with the unchained fighter base class.
All new alternate class options for the fighter, including new advanced armor training options, new advanced weapon training options, and new fighter training options.
A dozen of new feats designed to help further customize your unchained fighter.
And much more!

215223.name: Rund um die Welt
215223.description: Up to 7 players travel around the world by different means of travel: car, sailing yacht, bicycle, train, horse, airplane and whaler/dog slet. Each means of travel has it's own colored travel route and it's own travel guide. Movement is determined by a die. On some destinations, events hinder or benefit the player. The first player to reach his starting point wins the game.

215224.name: Doctor Who Roleplaying Game Gamemaster's Companion
215224.description:
From publisher blurb:

So you're the Gamemaster now?

Sitting in the Gamemaster's chair can be the most daunting job in roleplaying games. It is also the most rewarding. This book is here to help you get the most out of the experience.

The Gamemaster's Companion is a resource for you to use to run the Doctor Who Roleplaying Game, offering expert advice on creating scenarios in the style of the Doctor’s adventures. It’s a veritable toolbox of tips, tricks and techniques that you can use in your own games.

You’ll be using flashbacks, starting games in media res and ending your next session with a killer cliffhanger before you know it!

Featuring:

Starting out – how to set up a new game, and advice on guiding your players through effective character creation.
Adventures – an advice-filled exploration of the role of the Gamemaster, detailing plotting adventures, detailed, expert guidance on writing story arcs, and a gigantic random adventure generator.
Villains and Monsters – a TARDIS-full of hints and tips on creating memorable villains and effective adversaries for your games.
Settings – how to create them and how to get your players onboard.
Running Games - guidance for keeping everyone happy, busy and engaged, with notes on pacing, foreshadowing, exterminating characters, people, places, planets and impossible places.
Three new Doctor Who adventures – Death in Toytown, The Grip of the Kraken and The Bellagio Imbroglio.

215225.description:
The Cursed Expansion unleashes all of the delicious chaos of a new puppy and a new kitten into your game. Be warned: this addition of curses, chaos, and mummified pets is certain to both delight and dismay!

Includes:
Cursed Expansion Rules
2 Wooden Cursed Meeples
2 Cursed Bidding Cards
215225.name: Heir to the Pharaoh: Cursed Expansion

215226.name: Psia Krew
215226.description:
User summary:

Psia Krew (Dog Blood) is set in the action film genre of the 1980s/1990s, with bullets pouring down like rain. The game world resembles our own, with one crucial difference - instead of humans, it is filled with dogs.

You can create your dog or bitch of any breed with any profession, as long as they have a totally messed-up life. The rules are flexible enough to support whatever type of character you can come up with.

215227.name: Pirates! Stratego
215227.description:
Stratego Pirates is an exciting game for two brave pirate captains!

Can you lead your pirates to victory? The aim of the game is to conquer the flag by boarding your enemy's ship.

By cunningly flipping the action cards, you can influence whether you get to board, fire the cannon, fight or feed one of your opponents to the sharks.

Will you be the first to capture your opponent's flag? If so, you win the game!

For 2 players and ages 5+.

The difference between Stratego and Pirates! Stratego is the use of the canon and the use of the action tiles. This makes it a much more luck based game and more suitable for little children.

215228.name: Top 2000 Pop Quiz expert editie
215228.description:
Everybody have one of those friends with more than normal knowledge of pop music. Now you have the change to test them.

Object of the game is to score more points which you can win by answering questions about pop music

The game contains 49 question cards, each containing 6 questions and an extra 5 cards with tie-breaker questions

The game is based on the annual Dutch radio and tv progam Top 2000, in which the public votes for the best pop songs of all time (usually Queen's Bohemian Rhapsody).

215229.name: Voyage to Victory
215229.description:
Publisher Blurb: A security alert during a school trip to a museum somehow sends Sam and Lisa back in time—and into the clutches of a ferocious eighth-century Viking crew. To help them return home, readers must solve an intriguing series of puzzles that will jump them to different pages in the book.
This interactive, nonlinear mystery recalls the popular Choose Your Own Adventure stories, but with many more illustrations and activities. As children read the exciting story, they must complete mazes, word games, and other puzzles that will provide them with clues to which pages to turn to next. Solutions included.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215230.name: The Restored Holy Realm of the Faithful of the Shield Lands
215230.description:
From the introduction:

The Shield Lands are located near the center of the Flanaess, on the northern coast of the Nyr Dyv. By land, we are nearly surrounded by the hostile Empire of Iuz.
...
Unfortunately we recovered only a small piece of our nation during the Great Crusade; the lands immediately surrounding Critwall and Scragholme Island. The rest of the Shield Lands is completely dominated and controlled by the occupying forces of Iuz.

215231.name: Trapdoor to Treachery
215231.description:
Publisher Blurb: This is no ordinary detective story! To help Sam and Lisa investigate a series of mysterious thefts, kids must crack codes, follow mazes, and unravel many other tricky situations that will jump them to different pages in the book.
This interactive, nonlinear mystery recalls the popular Choose Your Own Adventure stories, but with many more illustrations and activities. As children read the exciting story and solve the puzzles, they'll discover clues to which pages to turn to next. Solutions included.

215232.name: Fighter: Martial Archetypes
215232.description:
From the introduction:

At 3rd level, a fighters gains the Martial Archetype feature. Here are new options for that feature: Arcane Archer, Knight, Samurai, and Sharpshooter.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215233.name: Lifeline
215233.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Critwall Bridge has always been a vital link between Furyondy and the Shield Lands. Destroyed during the Greyhawk Wars, it is nearly rebuilt. You must guard it during this most vulnerable time to prevent forces of Iuz from destroying it a second time.

An adventure for 1st and 2nd level characters.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215234.name: Temple of the Burning Man
215234.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

An important archeological dig is occurring on Scragholme Island. It may reveal information important to the survival of the revived Shield Lands. You, among others, have been chosen to accompany the archeologists to the dig site.

An adventure for 1st and 2nd level characters.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215235.name: In the Name of the Father
215235.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

A dark cloud follows a hero of the Shield Lands' reclamation. The name of the noble family is tainted by accusations of his father and brother's treason. Can proof be found to clear his name and allow him to help lead the nation to further victory?

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215236.name: The God Below
215236.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

A scream in the night sends you chasing the path of an enemy in the city of Critwall. Can you stop the evil of The God Below?

An adventure for character levels 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215237.name: Enter the Naga
215237.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

With Iuz's armies ever probing for weakness in the defenders of the Shield Lands, Lady Katarina is always looking for allies. A potential ally has appeared from an unexpected direction, the Nyr Dyv, and you have been summoned to aid in the alliance.

An adventure for character levels 1 - 6.

rpgseries: A World of Adventure for Fate Core System
215238.name: Red Planet
215238.description:
From publisher blurb:

Join the Martian Union of Materialist Republics today!

It’s the year 773 Post Revolution, and Mars is basking in the long embrace of progressive materialism. The Union of Materialist Republics rules over a utopian planet and two moon colonies. The people are happy in their roles; the governments of the Republic remain at peace with one another; technology designed to better mankind advances by leaps and bounds.

But all is not entirely peaceful, for the Union is under attack by the corrupt “U.S.S.R.” and decadent “U.S.A.” back on Earth, the feudal alien Venusians, and the expansionist two-dimensional Country of the Geometers!

Defend the Union and Mars against its enemies, and bring glory to yourself, your squad, and your collective. Put your lives on the line to defend utopia in Red Planet, a Soviet retro-pulp adventure by Jess Nevins. Red Planet requires Fate Core to play. This 59-page supplement includes:

A detailed review of the solar system—Fate-style
A social-class based character generation system with two new skills: pilot and renown
Interesting new rules for Conversions: a mental conflict in which characters try to convince others to agree with their point of view
Pulp-style spaceships and gear to equip your campaign
A sample adventure: 34 Chernykh




Welcome, Citizen, to the Red Planet.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215239.name: The Bleak Shore of Axeport
215239.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Shield Lands always has need of new allies. Some were found in the deep waters of the Nyr Dyv. You must aid them in a mission if they are to aid the Shield Lands.

An adventure for character levels 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215240.name: Cult of Torment
215240.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Disappearing corpses, petrified victims, bloody wolf prints. The Raven of Desire watches, the Cult of Torment waits.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215241.name: The Fallen
215241.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The many friends of an injured man with a mysterious past ask the heroes to search for a way to heal him.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215242.name: Lord Torkeep's Request
215242.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Your small group of Pathfinders has been ordered to scout near Torkeep in preparations for a possible offensive against Iuz. The first stop is the Ritensa Outpost along the northern border, but before you can continue, you receive a summons from Lord Torkeep. It seems to be an important request...

An adventure for characters level 2 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215243.name: The Portal
215243.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Someone has breached the ancient portal near Torkeep in an attempt to recover a dangerous item that could herald the end of the Shield Lands... or perhaps save it. You must enter the portal and stop them from reaching their goal. Before you're done you may have to choose between your duty and your conscience.

An adventure for characters level 2 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215244.name: The Invisible Hand
215244.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The time has come to free Gensal from the grip of Iuz. The Pathfinders must strike before the keep is strong once againt.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215245.name: The Eldritch Wave
215245.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

One year ago a tomb was opened and a powerful artifact called "Truth" was stolen. Soon thereafter an enigmatic group of prophets gave vision of a wretched sea demon summoned with this artifact to wreck havoc upon the Shield Lands. The race to recapture this relic and stop the summoning has ended abruptly; the Shield Lands have lost. Truth has opened, the demon has arrived, the Eldritch Wave bleeds.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

215246.name: GM's Monthly Miscellany (Compendium 2016)
rpgissuearticle: 10 Things to See in a Burned Out Building
10 Things to See in a Plague-Infested Building
20 Bulky Treasures Difficult to Get Out of the Dungeon
20 Curses to Encounter in a Necropolis
20 Minor Hauntings to Encounter in an Ancient Necropolis
20 Minor Treasures to Find in a Smuggler’s Storeroom
20 Things to Decorate a Wizard’s Tower
20 Things to Find in a Mine
20 Things to Say if a PC Searches for a Trap and Finds Nothing
20 Things to See During an Orc Raid
I Loot the Bag of Holding: Adventuring Gear
I Loot the Druid: Pouch Contents
I Loot the Rogue’s Body: Tools of the Trade
Monastery of the Marble Palm At a Glance
Shunned Valley of the Three Tombs: Notable Locations
The Fallacy of the Adventurer’s Backpack
The Midnight Market At a Glance
The Mistfall Refuge At a Glance
The Mudded Manse At a Glance
An Uneventful Day’s Travel in the Hills
An Uneventful Day’s Travel in the Swamp
Why Character Optimisation is Pointless (Unless You Enjoy It)
Why Your Campaign Needs More Rumours
215246.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Compatible GM's Resource by John Bennett, Creighton Broadhurst, Kalyna Conrad, Kat Evans, Jeff Gomez, Richard Green, Eric Hindley, Anthony Jennings, Neal Litherland, Greg Marks, Jacob W. Michaels, Brian Wiborg Mønster, Stephen Radney-MacFarland, Jacob Trier, Amber Underwood, Josh Vogt, Christopher Wasko and Mike Welham

Featuring material from some of Raging Swan Press’s newest products as well as classic releases of yesteryear, advice articles and material from Creighton’s own Borderland of Adventure campaign, the GM’s Monthly Miscellany series is a terrific free resource for the busy, time-crunched GM. GM’s Monthly Miscellany: Compendium 2016 collates the material presented in the second eleven instalments of the line all designed to make running your game as simple and easy as possible.
This is a compilation product and features all the material presented in the third 11 GM’s Monthly Miscellany (which are all available for free here in this store). There is no need to buy this product if you own all the previous line instalments. However, if you do buy GM’s Monthly Miscellany: Compendium 2016, know your generosity helps me to not only run my blog but also to keep writing daily gaming advice articles.

This product is a Dual Format PDF. The downloadable ZIP file contains two versions, one optimised for printing and use on a normal computer and one optimised for use on a mobile device such as an iPad.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215247.name: A Message from Ringland
215247.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The spring of 592 CY brings new dangers to the Shield Lands, but also new hopes as well. After more than seven years of silence a message arrives from the town of Ringland; a town deep inside occupied territory. Can you survive the dangers of the new border long enough to reach Ringland and reestablish contact with a town long since thought destroyed?

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215248.name: The Moon Gatherer
215248.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Milky white moonlight bathes the gathered, breathless, delighted fey. Breathlessly, they watch the coming gathering with delight. Delighted they watch as breathless moonlight comes before those gathered. The moonlight arrives, gathering those without breath, coming.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215249.name: Beyond the Pale
215249.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The stars shine a victorious evening for Beltar of Malice. The tea leaves read a hideous poem of Erythnul the Many. The songs of Hextor the Champion of Evil invade the air. The deceitful eye of Iuz watches the deceptive eye of Vecna who observes sleeping Critwal from afar and sees only the Black Rider approach. The chains that bind He of Eternal Darkness weaken. The Foe of all good is near. We sense the most unholy of alliances coming. My young acolyte, it is only us that are fully prepared. Welcome to the Temple of Spirit. You are now Beyond the Pale.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215250.name: Secrets Within...
215250.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

More refugees are returning home, and you must escort the latest group to arrive, but when some start dying, the heroes must find out why, and what it has to do with a mysterious item that everyone seems to want.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215251.name: A Plague Upon You
215251.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A mysterious plague is spreading in the villages south of Critwall. Can the Pathfinders find the cause before the harvest is ruined?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215252.name: Dark Moons Rising
215252.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Several months ago Pathfinders reestablished contact with the town of Ringland, long thought to have fallen to the Old One and his evil minions. Since then, regular communication has been established and troops, including Pathfinders, have been sent to garrison the town's defenses. You have been ordered to relieve some of the Pathfinders currently in Ringland and spend one week under Lord Reyneld's command.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215253.name: Obsidian, Round 1
215253.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Your party is returning from a two-week patrol in the occupied lands controlled by the wizard Vayne when captured members of the army of Iuz offer to give you information that may be important to the Shield Lands. Looks like your return to the safety of Fort Vigilance is going to be delayed...

An adventure for characters level 1 - 10.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215254.name: Obsidian, Round 2
215254.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Your party is returning from a two-week patrol in the occupied lands controlled by the wizard Vayne when captured members of the army of Iuz offer to give you information that may be important to the Shield Lands. Looks like your return to the safety of Fort Vigilance is going to be delayed...

An adventure for characters level 1 - 10.

rpgseries: The Shackled City Adventure Path Conversion
215255.name: The Demonskar Legacy
215255.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This is a conversion guide to [5th Edition for] chapter five of the Shackled City Adventure Path.

User summary:

This product is an item-by-item conversion guide for The Shackled City Adventure Path as originally published in Dungeon. This conversion guide covers only the portion of the adventure path contained in The Demonskar Legacy published in Dungeon (Issue 104 - Nov 2003) / Polyhedron (Issue 163). The original material is required to use this product.

215256.name: The Fishing Club 3D
215256.description:
https://www.facebook.com/TheFishingClubGame

Go fishing and relax! Bait your hooks and catch over 50 different fish species from the smallest roach to the mighty sharks, in beautiful 3D locations all over the world. Create your own fishing club and go fishing with friends, take part in exciting competitions, and weekly club tournaments.

215257.name: Mr. Massagy
215257.description:
User Summary

Use your dating skills to get a well-earned Massage.

215258.description:
Promotional card offered by "Man vs Meeple Season One Kickstarter".

Hero. 3. Can attack 2 buildings.
215258.name: Vikings Gone Wild: Meeple Bros Promo Card

215259.name: The Sock Game
215259.description:
Game Design by: Nick Green and Jono Green

A team game for the whole family to enjoy. Players will divide into 2 teams and each team will take a sock containing 35 different items. Following the selection of teams, an arrow will be spun on the included spinner to select the object both teams will be going for. Once the item is selected, the race will be on for one player from both teams to find the selected item in their sock. The catch? The players can only search for the item using touch and feel. The first player to find the item and remove it from their sock, earns a point for their team. The first team to score 11 points and win by two...wins the game. (If 2 player, first to 5.)

The Three No's Of The Sock Game
(Violations earn an instant point to the other team)

No Twosies - Only one hand is allowed into the sock, you can use the other hand to feel for the objects from the outside.

No Twitching - Stay in your blocks. False starts are strictly forbidden. Never have your hand in the sock before an object has been called.

No Peeking - No rolling the sock down and taking a sneaky look inside.

215260.name: INTRUDER - WAR AREAS
215260.description:
INTRUDER - WAR AREAS Do you like games that last for hours? Do you like games in which you can launch missiles, throw bombs and destroy things? Do you like stealth games? Then INTRUDER - WAR AREAS made for you!

Source: The Developer Website.

215261.name: Color Cubed
215261.description: Color-matching fun for everyone! Place any card to start. Each card includes different combinations of up to four colors, so be sure to look at your cards closely. How many colors can you match with your next play? Match the most colors, and win! This addictive, make-you-think strategy game builds matching, critical thinking, and addition skills. Includes 40 cards and Activity Guide. Cards measure 3"H; box measures 4½" x 4½". For 2–6 players.

215264.name: Winged Sakura: Demon Civil War
215264.description:
Incarnated into a world of demons, you find yourself caught up in a middle of a demon civil war. Form contracts with demons and aid the Rebellions to take back what's rightfully theirs in this beautifully illustrated turn-based RPG!

Source: The Developer Website.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215265.name: The Lonely Tower
215265.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

You have been ordered to relieve the Pathfinders garrisoned at a small border outpost near Torkeep. The ruined tower once belonged to a Shield Mage named Orand Hastironn. Orand’s remains were found in the highest level of the tower by Pathfinders during the Battle of Torkeep. You arrive at the outpost to find that something is definitely wrong at Orand’s Tomb.

Part 1 of The Towers series.

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 3-12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215266.name: The Patron of Bright Sentry
215266.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Lord Natan Enerick's decision to make Pholtus the Patron deity of Bright Sentry may cause more trouble than expected. Can you discover who is behind a plot to ruin the celebration, and put an end to it in time?

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 2-12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215267.name: The Moonlight Arrives
215267.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The mysterious Markuth returns with a dire warning. It is up to the Pathfinders to decipher its meaning...

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 1-13.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215268.name: A Light in the Dark
215268.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The mystery of a missing noble leads to the dangerous shores of the Nyr Dyv.

Part 2 of The Towers series.

A D&D adventure for 5th-13th level characters.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215269.name: Blood Alliances
215269.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

There is a spy in Critwall who knows vital secrets concerning the Shield Lands, and he’s been caught. But who has him? The Pathfinders are asked to discover who has him, and soon, before the spy spills everything he knows to those who have him.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215270.name: A Chink in the Armor
215270.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The opportunity to scout Southkeep has presented itself. Will the mission be compromised from within?

This is an adventure for heroes of levels 1 through 14 willing to travel undercover to the enemy, itself!

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215271.name: Noble Intentions
215271.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

You have been ordered to capture an officer in Iuz’s army and return him to the Shield Lands for questioning. When complications arise even before you leave Critwall, how will you choose which way leads to success and which to failure and dishonor?

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 1-14.

This adventure uses the revised Dungeons & Dragons rules.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215272.name: In the Cold Grave
215272.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

It is late in the month of Sunsebb and once again you find yourself stationed at “Orand’s Tomb” to the west of Torkeep on the banks of the Ritensa River. Just as last year’s winter blasted the normally temperate Shield Lands with freezing rain, deep snow and harsh north winds, this winter seems to be shaping up much the same. A mysterious visitor in the night beckons you to follow him into the growing storm. Do you dare follow?

Part 3 of The Towers series.

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 1-14.

This adventure uses the revised Dungeons & Dragons rules.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215273.name: The Good Oerth
215273.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The PCs must journey to a legendary place to avenge the death of a comrade and prevent the forces of the Old One from gaining an unexplained but valuable weapon. Untested allies spread their wings and strange bedfellows are made. By the adventure’s end, lives may be traded for answers in the unraveling of the mystery of pure earth.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215274.name: In the Service of the Lady
215274.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The lands near Gensal will be repopulated with settlers. This will require additional troops to be stationed at the village to protect the settlers. Lady Katarina will be traveling with the new troops and settlers to see them safely installed. She has asked for Pathfinders to accompany her on her journey.

An adventure for brave adventurers levels 2 to 14.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215275.name: End of the Path
215275.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As the chill winds of Fireseek set in, a young man’s long road is coming to a close. The council has requested brave adventures to aid him in the final leg of his journey.

An adventure for intrepid adventurers APL 2 to 12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215276.name: Just Can't Stop
215276.description:
An Introduction One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Dancing is an excellent form of entertainment and exercise. It can also drive one to a powerful sense of passion and conviction. However, those whose passions push them beyond caring for anything else lose sight of life and the pleasures therein. Are you willing to do what you can to help remind them of that?

An Introduction module set in the Shield Lands.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215277.name: Small Time Trouble
215277.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Gensal after long last is being resettled. People have moved out here to make a new life for themselves. However, with new life come the same old problems. There are those who would take advantage of just such a situation. Are you willing to do what you can in order to stop an age old problem from taking hold here in a “new” small town?

An Introductory module for the Shield Lands region.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215278.name: Bad Influences
215278.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A large number of children have gone missing in recent weeks, most of them from Gensal. Frantic parents are looking for help... Will you step forward and undertake the task of finding the children and the mystery behind their disappearance?

A Living Greyhawk adventure for level one characters only.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215279.name: The Cave
215279.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Increased military activity by Iuz requires a scouting mission.

An Introductory module for 1st-level PCs, set in the Shield Lands.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215280.name: If the Towers Should Fall
215280.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A Disturbing dream has drawn you to Admundfort where the mad wizard Waquonis, servant of Iuz, has learned the secret of the Shield Mages! He stands poised to overrun the Towers of the Shield Mages, slaughter any survivors who still defend them and seize the power within. Can you steal his prize out from under his wicked nose before all is lost? The conclusion to the Towers series.

A Living Greyhawk adventure for character levels 4-16 containing extended play options and un-tiered encounters. Play at your own risk!

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215281.name: The Banners of Torkeep
215281.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Council of Lords called for the Banners (Ancient Writs of Title) of the Lords to be presented.

This adventure of redemption and hope for tables of adventurers of APL 2 through 12 involves the aftermath of the presentment ceremony.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215282.name: Better Off Dead?
215282.description:
A Two-Round Continuous Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

For months, Lady Katarina’s dead body has lain in state at the Cathedral of the Shield Reclaimed. All attempts to contact her soul have failed, and the Council of Lords has let the nation’s military sink into disorganization rather than declare a new Knight Commander. Tired of the politicking, a coalition supported by the Shield Lands navy moves to take advantage of the recent tumult in Admundfort... but will their bold move leave the Shield Lands open to an assault from the Old One?

Part One of The Return.

This is a Shield Lands adventure for APLs 6–12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215283.name: May the Axe Grow Great
215283.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Troubles in the Shield Lands have divided the nation. Traitorous doubles may have infiltrated all levels of Shield Lands society. Now the Council of Lords faces its greatest challenge, determining who is loyal and who is not. Unfortunately, the information that would reveal that has disappeared. Rumors have now come forward that an ancient artifact, the Helm of Heironeous, lies behind enemy lines. These events are tied together in the conclusion of The Rescue Series.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215284.name: A Deepening Malice
215284.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Attempts to contact survivors inside the Tower of the Shield Mages in Admundfort have failed to breach the arcane defenses for months. The search for remaining Shield Mages outside the tower has yielded no one. The PCs are given orders to follow up a reference from a now-deceased Shield Mage’s diary. The trail leads deep into occupied territory to the edge of the treacherous Great Effluvial Swamp!

This is a Shield Lands adventure for APLs 2–12.

215286.name: Perplexus Micro: Q-Bot
215286.description:
From the publisher's website:

The first in the new Perplexus Micro line! Inside the clear cube is a fun and funky robot that features a winding, moving track for players to maneuver the marble through! Perplexus® Micro was designed to attract the attention of Perplexus fans, as well as draw in new players with its 3" size and smaller price. These collectible games are easy to pick up, but hard to put down!

There are 33 challenges to this 3D maze game.

215287.name: Geek Out! Family
215287.description:
Geek Out!™ is the outrageous game that finds out once and for all which player is the most knowledgeable about your favorite pop culture subjects!

In the game, you will draw cards asking you to list things which fall under a certain category. Before you begin, however, the other players may try to steal your points (and bragging rights!), by bidding to list even more than the card requires. The bidding continues until one player is ready to “out-geek” their friends and family.

The award-winning geek trivia party game has taken on a new twist in this brand-new Geek Out!™ Family Edition! Level the playing field with topics the whole family geeks out over! This edition uses the same bidding mechanic made popular in the original Geek Out!, but also includes a Gameboard and features topics in categories like Science, Music, History, Pop Culture, and more!

You don’t have to be a geek (but it helps!) to win this amazing social interaction and bluffing party game of geek lists!

Contents: 720 Lists on 144 Cards, 20 Chips, a 6-Sided Die, Gameboard and Instructions

215288.name: Tempest of Trouble
215288.description: Author's Blurb: The trouble starts at school when Sam and Lisa's new teacher turns out to be an evil witch! Using her magic wand and weird ingredients, Miss Sycorax casts one diabolical spell after another. Before they know it, Sam and Lisa find themselves stranded on an enchanted island with this vengeful witch, her wart-infested son and a host of enslaved sprites and whispering ghosts. Their only hope of escape is to banish the dreaded Sycorax. They can only do this with your help! Have you got what it takes?

215289.name: Curse of the Cockroach
215289.description: Author's Blurb: Millions of years ago, on a distant planet, a scientist entered his laboratory to find his cockroach experiment gone horribly wrong. His cockroaches lay dead in their terrarium, spelling out the words of a curse. Now, aeons later in the twenty-first century, creatures called Blats are ready to fulfil their ancestors' prophecy. Planet Earth is in serious danger. The future of the human race depends on three people, Sam, Lisa and YOU!

215290.name: Perplexus Micro: Drakko
215290.description:
From the publisher's website:

The second in the new Perplexus Micro line! The clear egg houses a fierce dragon, whose body forms a twisting path for marble maze fun! Perplexus® Micro was designed to attract the attention of Perplexus fans, as well as draw in new players with its 3" size and smaller price. These collectible games are easy to pick up, but hard to put down!

There are 33 challenges to this 3D maze game.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215291.name: A Dirty Little Job
215291.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Shield Lands have survived much. Now, as the plague known as the Black Breath sweeps the nation, Adventurers are sent on a quest to find a cure. The first leg of their journey brings them to Bright Sentry where they must seek out an old friend and enlist her aid.

An adventure for parties of APL 2-6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215292.name: As Long As We're Here
215292.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As an old friend departs to determine how to cure the Black Breath disease, you are invited into Bright Sentry. Much has changed here since the onslaught of disease, and outsiders are rarely allowed inside.

An Living Greyhawk adventure for APL 2 to 6.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215293.name: The Book of Dark Alchemy
215293.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Plague ravages the Shield Lands. As the population weakens, reports are that the forces of Iuz are growing stronger. The party has an opportunity to secure part of the cure but to do so must face evils best left sleeping...

An adventure for hearty adventurers who are not afraid of sacrificing themselves for the good of the Shield Lands.

User summary:

For character levels 2 - 8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215294.name: More Than We Bargained For
215294.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A badly wounded adventurer tells tales of gold and glory that awaits those with stout hearts and strong blades.

An adventure for intrepid adventures APL’s 4 – 12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215295.name: The Man from D.Y.V.E.R.S.
215295.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Shield Lands needs a mighty artifact dedicated to Hextor. The artifact is necessary for a ritual that will hopefully end the plague known as the Black Breath of Iuz! Unfortunately, it is currently in the hands of one of Dyvers’ best loved agents: his goal? To destroy this artifact! Can the adventurers of the Shield Lands defeat... The Man from D.Y.V.E.R.S.?

An adventure recommended for characters levels 1-8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215296.name: Running Out of Time
215296.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Time is of the essence. A siege army of Iuz minions began a new offensive against the Shield Lands several months ago, bringing with them a devastating plague which has now spread to the farthest corners of the Shield Lands. The race for the cure continues...

An adventure for parties of APLs 2-8.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215297.name: Where the Pirates Arrrre
215297.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A notorious pirate has been raiding the newly reclaimed lands around Scragholme Island. The fledgling Shield Lands navy has been unable to catch the murderous brigand and the people cry out for someone to find and rid them of the pirate.

An adventure for parties of APL 6-12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215298.name: On Solid Grounds
215298.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Black Breath of Iuz is a terrible affliction that has ravaged the Shield Lands for nearly a year now. Was the plague moves across the lands, wiping out peasant and noble alike, hope fades from the once proud eyes of the Shield Landers. But in a sea of darkness rests a glimmer of hope. A cure for the plague may exist. A specially selected army regiment has been constructed to travel to the mysterious Sidhee forest in hopes of finding this cure.

An adventure for parties of APL 2-12.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215299.name: The Only Good Orc...
215299.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The only good orc... is a dead orc, they say. Welcome to the Shield Lands where we make sure every orc is a good orc.

An Introductory module for 1st-level PCs, set in the Shield Lands.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215300.name: Behind Enemy Lines
215300.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Waghalter’s is in need of new mercenaries to meet the increased demand for services. A secret mission into the Old One’s territory is necessary to re-supply a spy behind enemy lines.

An Introductory module for 1st-level PCs, set in the Shield Lands.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215301.name: No Honest Dealings
215301.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Bandits have been raiding merchant caravans just outside of Gensal. If the merchants grow too frightened to deliver supplies to outlying border holds, the Shield Lands might suffer a serious setback in their struggle against the forces of Old Wicked.

An Introductory module for 1st-level PCs, set in the Shield Lands.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215302.name: Spelunking the Scragholme Cave
215302.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

After brave adventurers cleansed Scragholme Cave of nearly all its monsters, a wandering farmer found a cave mouth near the back of his new fields. He spent some time exploring it, then realized it was far bigger than he could have possibly imagined. Word traveled to all sorts of interested parties, but even powerful magic users could divine but little about the cave. Now Lord Enerick, of Bright Sentry, has decided to host a competition, with a significant prize to be awarded to the first team to reach the bottom of Scragholme Cave!

An Introductory module for 1st-level PCs, set in the Shield Lands.

215303.name: Attack on Hilo Ahu Beach
215303.description:
(publisher blurb)

ATTACK ON HILO AHU BEACH is a support mission designed for WWII: Operation WhiteBox™. It’s the morning of Dec 7, 1941, and you’ve just stumbled onto a squad of Japanese marines, hell-bent on destruction. Can you stop their murderous rampage as the bombs rain down on Pearl Harbor?

Attack on Hilo Ahu Beach is designed for 3-6 characters of 1st-3rd level.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215304.name: Book Delivery
215304.description:
An Introductory One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A simple task easy enough for young inexperienced adventurers. Enter a swamp and retrieve a book. But, what treachery does that
swamp hold?

A one-round Shield Lands Introductory Adventure for 1st-level characters only.

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215305.name: Rumble on the Ritensa
215305.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

Who are the Green Masters? And why have they come to the Shield Lands? Perhaps the invitations they have magically posted in taverns everywhere might provide a clue: “Come one, come all, to the Greatest Show on Oerth! Come see the Contest of Champions, the Mammoth Muddle of the Mighty, the Rumble on the Ritensa! Adventurers of all creeds and experience particularly welcome. Your friends, the Green Masters.”

rpgseries: SHL - Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Regional Adventures
215306.name: The Chaos at Law's Forge
215306.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Shield Lands Special Adventure

From the introduction:

The Standing Army needs adventurers to gather information inside of Iuzian-occupied Law’s Forge in order to better plan an assault. You get the job.
